title: D...brown
author: D...brown
content: Hello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.

comments.author: EL MOHA
comments.body: Welcome, you can start by reading the pinned threads on this board you just posted on, they have almost everything you need to know about the forum. Here is also a beginners Encyclopedia by Ratimov. It comprises of everything about the forum from its rules to bitcoin and essentially articles or thread and also alticoins.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: First and foremost you have to take into consideration is the forum rules and regulations which is the first link from the helpful threads i sent below.Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0posting etiquetteshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5184741.0#post_altgiveawayeverything you need to know about forum rank, activities and merits.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0Beginners and Help Encyclopediahttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5364418.0Let me remind you one of the most important rules which says don't plagiarize, be patient and keep to learning, ensure that you go through the rules and understand them, they are what will guide you through the use of this forum, some other members as well be be giving some other helpful threads links along, make sure you read and learn.Welcome onboard.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. It's a good place to be. Just like they say, "This is America; you can be whatever you choose to be." That's how this forum is. You can be whatever you want to be in here. Define your purpose and start exploring. The forum is broad, and you can find anything on it.All thanks to Ratimov, you can now find most answers to the questions that you might have in mind all in one place. Check out  Beginners and Help Encyclopaedia : ¬†you can find all helpful links there. Also learn how to use the search option on the forum, as it will save you a lot of stress from repeating questions and already discussed topics.Edit; the above member drop the link why I was typing..

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!If you scroll down a little further you can find a similar thread Am a newcomer here please help and guide which will be more helpful since it has enough replies to answer what you are looking for.If you have any queries in the future use the search button at the top right corner prior creating a thread Now you can go ahead and lock this thread which you can find at the bottom left corner

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.created_time: August 30, 2023, 04:34:29 PMLast edit: September 01, 2023, 04:46:00 AM by Egii Nna
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.You are welcome this is the best forum that I have seen before that bitcoin and other cryptocurrency are been learn and discussed, so you as a new comer don‚Äôt hesitate to ask questions because it will help you allot both in treading and mining and most especially read and make adequate research that will help so that you can‚Äôt omit any rules of this forum because if you did so you will end up loosing your account or you might have your account banned due to plagiarism or other what I will advise you is that you should focus more on understanding bitcoin and other cryptocurrency and the forum than hunting for merit that many other members engage and end up doing plagiarism so you can use this link beginners encyclopedia by Ratimov

comments.author: Issa56
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.Welcome to the forum. People that commented above me have already provided the necessary information, which I believe will guide you on the forum here, but I don't really think this thread that you created is really useful. I've seen like two similar threads within two days. I don't really know why you have to create the thread because all the necessary information is already pinned in every section of the forum, so I don't think you really need people to start sending it to you again. If you can't go around the forum and check it yourself, then I don't think you are really ready to learn here. ¬†I will remind you of something that people might not talk about: we don‚Äôt need AI-generated posts on the forum here, so make sure you avoid using AI to post and make sure you are sharing your idea here. I notice lots of people are now beginning to use AI to generate their posts; if you can do that, then your account will definitely be tagged when caught. Also, there is an offence that is popular among newbies, which is plagiarism. If you are making a post and you copied it from somewhere, don‚Äôt forget to quote and add a source link. Punishment for plagiarism is a ban, so you have to be careful.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.Hello and welcome!This is an online forum just like any other, used by thousands of users. Why do you feel like you need special guidance and that you can't explore things on your own? Sorry if I sounded harsh, but since you have obviously already found the Beginners & Help board, what is stopping you from browsing through the existing threads and reading some questions and comments from other users? That would be much more useful for you than opening a new topic with such a generic request.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed. You are welcome to the Bitcoin forum and as you can see there is not much things to learn here that to give attention to the rules that is guiding everyone of us here. That is the only thing that will save you from not being ban from this community. If you can try your best not to plagiarize, that alone¬† can keep you here safe for long. You can read some interesting posts on how to keep yourself safe as a Bitcoiner and avoid unnecessary challenge that could make you a victim of scam. Learn from those that had been here before you and try to obey rules.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Reading resources about bitcoin is important to participate completely in the forum discussions, mostly centered on bitcoin. You need to read as much as any bitcoin related contents shared above and ask questions to easily learn and get quality answers from members. The forum have different boards allocated to the different factors associated with bitcoin. And you must learn gradually, focus on the board that interests you. Grow from reading different terms, new jargon and words that you don't understand. We are here to learn, teach and exchange knowledge, that means your contributions matters too. I found a good resource about bitcoin FAQ https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/6jlop4/rbitcoin_faq_newcomers_please_read/ remember and stay clear from people who demand money from you and offer to mine bitcoin for you. Bitcoin mining is not for beginners and no app can mine bitcoin. Don't fall for this! A board is available for mining, if you have questions regarding how it works.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, this forum is a good place to learn about Bitcoin and other crypto currency, I believe that you have been given some helpful links that can help you go Forder on bitcointalk.org, reading the more on these forum will help you more, do more reading than posting.Since you have already found your way in here I believe you already know he good the forum can be of help.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.Welcome mate to the forum and you would find this forum is a very wonderful place filled with lots of knowledge about crypto and Bitcoin in particular and aside from this there are also lots of things prior our life that we can also learn and gain from fully involving ourselves in discussion here in the forum. As you can see alot of senior have given you good and tangible advice and I would just add up by letting you know the forum is rather simple as reading is everything because with reading you kinda equipt yourself with all the possible tools to survive and thrive here in this crypto community.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.Welcome to the forum. Do well to go through the links that has been provided by other members to you so that you don't find anything lacking as a new comer and ensure you ask questions where you need more answers the members of the community is always available to respond to your questions.Now concerning the suggestion you need from the forum members, I think you need to make your intentions very clear so that every one can know how to assist you since the forum is made up of members with vast information, knowledge of cryptocurrency and ideas that you may need to increase the one you have so it is up to you. Remember to give your time to learn and read comments, threads created by other members so you learn from what they have experienced or explained, good luck.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Thr provided link by other forum members are useful for newbies like you¬† and don't forget to always use the search feature of this forum and if it didn't help much then use google for example and make sure to add Bitcointalk at the end of what you have searched. Anyway, welcome to Bitcointalk forum and I hope you enjoy your time here in the forum. You should check the Beginners & Help Encyclopedia by Ratimov because it contains a lot of threads that you can learn.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.Just calm down and navigate the forum and read all the good information that you see but before then the first thing you have to do is to read forum rules to guide yourself so that you will be well inform and not to deviate from them. Once you deviate, you will be punished for that and they are different degree of punishment and the must common one is attack  As for now read more than posting.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.You should read this articles provided for you above as it will make learning easier for you,also don't forget to use the search engine to find whatever question or something that you want to know,for it must have been asked here before.You should learn more and only post on topics or discussions that you have the knowledge on and don't copy paste any write up from the internet here. It is called plagiarism and it is a ban offense. Be careful with dealing with people in the forum because it isn't everyone that is here with a clear mind,some are here to scam.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.Welcome to the forum mate and I want to let you know that here is a community of persons who are interested in bitcoin and cryptocurrency and for you to be here m, I believe you‚Äôre also interested in bitcoin and cryptocurrency as well.I also want you to be free and also know that here is a free space but while being comfortable, you shouldn‚Äôt plagiarism consciously and any post copied from the internet or any other article which you‚Äôre not the original author or poster should be referenced and credit should be given to the writer.While trying to learn please don‚Äôt b in a haste to make post on the forum but rather spend more time in studying the forum and reading more threads on the forum as these previous threads will easily help guide you.I also want to advice that you g identify with your local board or thread in the forum as it will be easier to get help on explanation about things on the forum especially if language might be a barrier.Welcome on board and there are a lot of opportunities on the forum but all depends on how much effort you put into your work.

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.I would say ...I love welcoming new participants in here cus, mhann...in the good old days, those were my motivations. Alot of discouragement came in too a couple of times....I remember a legendary member saying that he's seen alot of peeps just like me getting registered and it doesn't make any difference - I'm not gon level up anytime soon,..but what?!Keep on to the learning process - meits are accolades for a knowledge well proven, derived or tutored; you ain't gon' see them coming as you wish for a start.... just don't Back out. Read all through the nooks and crannies of this forum and outside - it's only gon' make you more confident since you'll know how to either help any lost technical dude, or someone just like yourself.Sandra üßë‚Äçü¶∞

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: D...brown on August 30, 2023, 04:10:05 PMHello!!!Am new here and I have seen that this forum is a very interesting place and I would love for other members here to guide me through the vast knowledge that is compiled here in this community. Every opinion and suggestions will be welcomed.Welcome to the forumI don't know how you reached this forum, because you are looking for people who can guide you, maybe you got it from social media. not from the person who told you.Just a suggestion you can get better guidance by discussing it on your local board. In the local language, you can ask questions and discuss more comfortably.there are tons of threads like this, you can find them and read the discussions to get a lot of information that you probably didn't need to ask. This may require more effort on your part, but that's how you grow in discussion forums.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: You already have few links that can help you to get familiar with forum and gain knowledge as well but only if you put efforts into it and spend some quality time over forum.I would add on to it that read all the pinned threads in board you are exploring that can give you lot of help and will prevent creating unnecessary threads with your each doubts.
